Metadata.Title: CVE-2023-0286 affecting package hvloader for versions less than 1.0.1-2
Metadata.Description: CVE-2023-0286 affecting package hvloader for versions less than 1.0.1-2. This CVE either no longer is or was never applicable.

Criterion.Comment: Package hvloader is earlier than 1.0.1-2, affected by CVE-2023-0286
